name: Mega Man 4 Voyage: Blue Version
summary:
When MartsINY (current author) and DurfarC started to have a different vision on the game (mostly for level lenght and some other level design aspects), they agreed that after at least 6 month of the original Mega Man 4 Voyage release, MartsINY could release a version fitting “How Mega Man 4 Voyage should have been in his vision”. So the current ROM hack is not pretending to be better than Mega Man 4 Voyage, but to correspond to MartsINY’s vision of a Mega Man game.

If you already played the original Mega Man 4 Voyage, consider this game only as a different version of it, such as what it could have been. It is in no way trying to be a huge improvement in accomplishment over Mega Man 4 Voyage (mostly level redesigning was done).
